text: is it possible to add fields to a page template without a module. My project has a specific feature which is fairly standalone, and isn't and shouldnt be used elsewhere on the site, however I could do with having some editable fields in there as well

Yes… I think it’s more limited than module fields, but you can drop in fields like:
```{% text "simple_text_field" label="Enter text here", value="This is the default value for this text field" %}```
  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#text>
Besides `text` there are a bunch of other options on that docs page as well.
Thanks for the feedback. I should be able to add those automatically.

Oh, left out that I believe you need to add `export_to_template_context=True` to make it editable on the page <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context>
